text:
Athens, Greece | Avocarrot | ONSITE | Full-time | Senior Front-End and Back-end Engineers

Avocarrot, the leading mobile ad exchange, is hiring experienced front-end and back-end software engineers.

The interview process consists of an initial phone screen and subsequent on-site technical pair programming interviews.

Our stack includes Go, Node.js, Java, Hadoop, Spark and React just to mention a few.

Apply now: https://avocarrot.workable.com/

#jointhehackers
